sqlMap.insert: insert into stay (stay_no, stay_name,stay_location, stay_x,stay_y, stay_ex, stay_cate) values('S000'||stay_seq.nextval ,#stay_name#,#stay_location#,#stay_x#, #stay_y# ,#stay_ex#, #stay_cate#)
sqlMap.select: select stay_no from stay where stay_location = #location# and stay_name= #name#
sqlMap.insert: insert into room (room_no, stay_no, room_grade, room_price) values(#roomnum#,#stayno#, #grade#, #cost#)
sqlMap.update: update stay set stay_name =#stay_name#, stay_location =#stay_location#, stay_x = #stay_x#, stay_y = #stay_y#, stay_cate = #stay_cate# , stay_ex = #stay_ex# where stay_no = #stay_no#
update room set room_no = #room_no#, room_grade = #room_grade#, room_price = #room_price# where stay_no = #stay_no# and room_no = #roomnum#
sqlMap.select: select a.room_grade, a.room_price,a.room_no, b.spho_path from room a, s_photo b where a.stay_no = b.stay_no and a.room_no = b.room_no and a.stay_no = #data# and b.room_no <> 'upload'
sqlMap.update: update s_review set sre_title = #sre_title#, sre_content = #sre_content#, sre_date =sysdate , sre_point = #sre_point#, sre_imgpath = #sre_imgpath# where sre_no = #sre_no#
